Package data.matrix

Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
data.matrix.Matrix
public final class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
Represents a distance matrix as a square or triangle depending on its symmetry and the ids of the profiles.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    static interface  Matrix.ICorrection
    Represents a correction formula for a phylogenetic distance.
    static interface  Matrix.IDistance
    Represents a phylogenetic distance provider between two profiles.

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors 
    Constructor Description
    Matrix​(boolean symmetric, java.lang.String[] ids, Matrix.IDistance distance)
    Create a lazy distance matrix corresponding to the given symmetry, ids and distance provider.
    Matrix​(boolean symmetric, java.lang.String[] ids, java.lang.Double[][] distances)
    Creates an eager distance matrix corresponding to the given symmetry, ids and phylogenetic distances.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Matrix correct​(Matrix.ICorrection correction)
    Gets a distance matrix corrected according to the given correction formula.
    double distance​(int i, int j)
    Gets the phylogenetic distance between two given profiles.
    java.lang.String[] ids()  
    int size()  

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • Matrix

      public Matrix​(boolean symmetric, java.lang.String[] ids, Matrix.IDistance distance)
      Create a lazy distance matrix corresponding to the given symmetry, ids and distance provider.
      Parameters:
      symmetric - a flag indicating whether this matrix is a square (asymmetric) or a triangle (symmetric)
      ids - the ids of the profiles of this matrix
      distance - the lazy distance provider to populate this matrix

    • Matrix

      public Matrix​(boolean symmetric, java.lang.String[] ids, java.lang.Double[][] distances)
      Creates an eager distance matrix corresponding to the given symmetry, ids and phylogenetic distances.
      Parameters:
      symmetric - a flag indicating whether this matrix is a square (asymmetric) or a triangle (symmetric)
      ids - the ids of the profiles of this matrix
      distances - the calculated phylogenetic distances to populate this matrix

  • Method Details

    • ids

      public java.lang.String[] ids()

    • size

      public final int size()

    • distance

      public double distance​(int i, int j)
      Gets the phylogenetic distance between two given profiles.

      If the given profiles are the same, then returns 0.

      Parameters:
      i - a number identifying one profile in this matrix
      j - a number identifying another profile in this matrix
      Returns:
      the phylogenetic distance between the profiles identified by i and j

    • correct

      public Matrix correct​(Matrix.ICorrection correction)
      Gets a distance matrix corrected according to the given correction formula.
      Parameters:
      correction - the correction formula to apply to each phylogenetic distance of this matrix
      Returns:
      a new distance matrix with the phylogenetic distances of this matrix corrected
